name: Chthonic Corridors - 7DRL22
description:
For best experience, be sure to play in full screen mode, 1080p display. We're not great at responsive design yet. Alternatively, you can download an executable below.

Chthonic Corridors is a classically inspired roguelite, with everything you might expect from the genre:

  • Twisty mazes
  • Punchable slimes
  • Infinite floors
  • Stealable loot
  • Get gains

Don't forget to get rich or die trying - each floor you clear gives you the option to cash in your riches to level up, or delve deeper in search of more loot. Which will you choose?

This game was made as part of the 7 Day Rogue Like 2022 game jam.

Follow our development on Discord
